name: ax5d

|- wi(w0, wi(w1, wal(s0, w1)))

comment: Version of ~ ax-5 with antecedent. Useful in proofs of deduction versions of bound-variable hypothesis builders. (Contributed by NM, 1-Mar-2013.)
